Vanuatu i wantem blong kat wan miting wetem Franis long end blong manis ia blong tokabuat isu blong Matthew mo Hunter aelan.
Hemia folem ripot wan warship blong Franis ibin ko long Matthew mo Hunter aelan ino long taem, mo polishim plague we i stap long tufala aelan ia, mo paintem wan flag blong Franis long ston long tufala aelan ia.
Parliamentary Sekretari long ofis blong Praem Minista, MP Johnny Koanapo i talem se Vanuatu ino lusum faith long ol negotiation blong hem ova long Matthew mo Hunter aelan, nomata long wan muv we Franis i mekem ino long taem.
Mr Koanapo i stap lidim negotiating tim blong Vanuatu blong toktok wetem kavman blong Franis from aelan ia.

Bai mi givim yu Jeriko, na king bilong en na ol strongpela soldia bilong en tu. 3Yu wantaim ol soldia bilong yu i mas wokabaut raunim dispela taun wanpela taim long olgeta de, i go inap 6-pela de i pinis. 47-pela pris i mas wokabaut i go pas long Bokis Kontrak na ol i mas karim ol biugel ol man i wokim long kom b

in inap long 6-pela de. 15Tulait i bruk long de namba 7, na ol i kirap na wokabaut raunim taun olsem ol i bin mekim bipo. Tasol long dispela de ol i raun 7-pela taim. 16Na long namba 7 taim ol i raunim taun, ol pris i winim biugel na Josua i tokim ol manmeri, “Singaut strong. Bikpela i givim taun long yupela pinis. 17Yumi mas bagarapim dispela taun na olgeta samting bilong en, olsem wanpela ofa yumi givim olgeta long Bikpela. Dispela pamukmeri Rahap tasol wantaim ol famili bilong en, yumi no ken

iko. Olsem na ol lain tumbuna bilong Rahap i stap long Israel inap long nau. 26Orait Josua i givim strongpela tok long ol manmeri olsem, “Sapos wanpela man i wokim gen dispela taun Jeriko, bai Bikpela i bagarapim em. Taim em i kirapim wok long dispela taun, bai namba wan pikinini man bilong en i dai. Na taim em i wokim ol bikpela dua bilong taun, bai las pikinini man bilong en i dai.” 27Bikpela i stap wantaim Josua, olsem na ol man long olgeta hap bilong dispela kantri ol i givim biknem long em.

Inau gat bikpla tok lukaut ikam long ol Nesenal Control Senta blong COVID-19 long Papua New Guinea, olsem ol man meri na ol yangpla imas go kisim test yet, maski vaccination roll out i ron pinis insait long kantri.
Minister blong Helt, Jelta Wong itok emi wari olsem ol man meri ino wok long harim toktok long banis ol yet na wearim mask na tu stap long we long ol bikpla grup.
Minister Wong i tok klia olsem long displa wik, bai oli mekim wanpla bikpla audit long hamaspla vaccine oli usim pinis insait long kantri long displa taim.
Bikpla tok lukaut oli nau mekim em olsem PNG bai i bungim namba three wave blong COVID-19 long mun June igo long mun September blong displa yia.
PNG inau gat 15, 901pla case blong COVID-19 na 162pla lain i dai pinis behainim displa sik.
Harim moa long program

Nius Hetlain:
Polis Komisina Gari Baki i tokaut pinis olsem ol lain Sekyuriti Kontrak man bilong Laurence Aviation na Sekyuriti Grup, nau i stap olsem ol spesol konstabol bilong Royal Papua Niugini Konstabulari; wanpela sajen long polis fos i save wok long Godens Polis Stesin, em polis i sasim em long yusim ol man nating long pablik long werim polis yunifom na mekim wok bilong polis, na wanpela lokol famesi kampani i askim ol manmeri long pablik long lukluk gut long ol giaman spray bilong ol meri we sampela ol stua long kantri i wok long salim. Ol i tok i gat bikpela wari olsem dispela spray i ken bagarapim skin bilong ol manmeri.

Wanpela meteor or stone ibin paia antap long wanpela city insait long sentrol Russia,na planti handred pipol ibin kisim bagarap taim ol glas na pipia bilongen i flai nambaut.
Bigpela moning bilong winta long hap ibin mekim ples i lait olgeta taim despela traipela ston ibin paia lait wantaim na flai antap long kilaut bilong Chelyabinsk,samting olsem 1,500 kilometa long east bilong Moscow.
Ol ofisal long hap bilip olsem despela meteor mas paia samting olsem 10,000 metres antap long city,na traipela ol paia ibin lait wantaim na pudaaun ikam daun long graun.
Bihainim paia, ol bigpela guria ibin kamap na pipol ibin pudaun nambaut.
Alarm bilong ol kar ibin wok long singaut nambaut na planti ol window ibin bruk nambaut long ol city.
Interior Ministry itok samting olsem 1,200 pipol ibin kisim bagarap bungim wantaim samting olsem 200 ol pikinini.
Ol pipia bilongen ibin pudaun antap long sampela building ,wantaim wanpela factory we wol bilongen ibin krungut igo insait.
Despela meteor or stone ibin flai ikam daun long kilaut i lusim traipela simuk bihain na pipol istap longwe olsem 200km insait long Yekaterinburg iken nap long lukim.
Ol residents itok ol ibin harim samting olsem wanpela bigpela pairap.
"I was driving to work, it was quite dark, but it suddenly became as bright as if it was day," 36 yar old resident bilong Yekaterinburg , Viktor Prokofiev i tok.
"I felt like I was blinded by headlights."
ABC/wires

Moning.
Yu save, planti manmeri i mekim tok olsem, “God i ken i kisim bek yumi.” Na yumi tu yumi save mekim wankain tok olsem. Planti taim yumi tok, “God i ken i kisim bek yumi long feitful wok bilong Jisas.” Tru, God i ken i kisim bek yumi long feitful wok bilong Jisas long diwai kros, tasol tok “kisim bek” i olsem wanem? Taim God i kisim bek wanpela man o wanpela meri, orait Em i mekim wanem kain pasin?
Tingim. Sapos meri bilong yu i lusim yu na em i paul nabaut wantaim ol man na em i mekim 2-

pa i bin mekim pasin nogut long papa na em i bin semim papa na em i daunim papa long ai bilong ol manmeri.
Tasol, olgeta taim papa i wetim pikinini nogut bilong em bilong kisim bek em. Na taim pikinini i kam bek gen long papa, orait papa i amamas long kisim bek pikinini nogut bilong em na i mekim em i stap pikinini bilong em gen.
Na dispela stori tu em i tok piksa. Papa bilong stori em i tok piksa long Papa God, na pikinini nogut em i tok piksa long yu na mi ol sinmanmeri. (Yu ken i lukim dispel
... (1790 chars skipped) ...
 bilipim na trastim feitful wok bilong Jisas long diwai kros.
[Krais Jisas] Em i rot bilong God i kisim bek yumi. Long dispela as, na Tok bilong God i tok pinis olsem, “Sapos yu laik litimapim na trastim nem bilong wanpela samting, orait yu litimapim na trastim nem bilong BIKPELA tasol.” 1 Korin 1:30-31.
Tok tenkyu long Papa, Em i wokim rot long feitful wok bilong Jisas long diwai kros bilong kisim bek yumi na bilong adoptim yumi bilong mekim yumi pikinini bilong Em long femili bilong Em.
Glenn.

Pasin blong ol Pasifik ailan pipol long strongim famili na lukautim komuniti ikirapim tingting blong Mathilda Martin blong West New Britain provins long Papua New Guinea long mekim voluntia wok long ol pasifik ailan kantri bihain long em ipinisim planti yia long wok long Australia.
Ms Martin em iwanpla Australia sitisen na istap moa long 20 yia long kantri tasol tingting blong em long PNG na "pasin West" imekim em long joinim Australian Volunteers Program na givim save na skils blong em igo bek long ol komuniti long pasifik.
Em itok ol diveloping kantri long Pasifik inidim planti sapot long helpim divelopmen na em mekim pes wok blong em long PNG wantaim PNG Legal Training Institute na redi nau long go long Marshall Islands neks yia.

Jehova i mekim planti samting bilong soim klia olsem em i gat bikpela pasin laikim. Skelim ol naispela samting i stap long ples antap. I gat planti bilion galaksi, na olgeta wan wan galaksi i gat planti bilion sta na

 pasin bilong mekim gut wok autim tok. Long 1933, ol pablisa i kirap long yusim wanpela kat i gat ol tok bilong Baibel long en. I gat planti rot bilong yusim dispela kat. Sampela pablisa i gat bikpela laik tru long mekim wok autim tok, tasol ol i sem na ol i no save long tok ol bai mekim. ela Baibel long tok Inglis, nem bilong God i kamap long ol dispela 5-pela ves, em 1 Samuel 2:25; 6:3; 10:26; 23:14, 16. Ol dispela rait i stap winim 1 tausen yia paslain long ol saveman ol i kolim Masoret i kolektim na bungim olgeta tok bilong Ol Skripsa Hibru. FIJI PRAIM MINIST NAU I BILIP OL HEVE LONG OL WOK POLITIC KLOSTI BAI P
MELBOURNE, Australia (Radio Australia, Aug. 18) - Fiji Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase,igat strongpela bilip olsem ol tingting wari long wanpela bung party cabinet or multi-party cabinet klostu bai pinis.
Mr Qarase ibin mekim despela toktok taim em ibin wok long givim toktok long ol bisnis komuniti bilong Auckland insait long wanpela bung long pinis bilong wik.
Em ibin tok, ol toktok bilong em wantaim Labour Party lida , Mahendra Chaudhry, ibin igo gut na ol bai tokaut long laspela hap decision long cabinet long pinis bilong despela mun.
Tasol , Mr Qarase itok ken olsem , Mr Chaudhry mas kamapim tingting yet long sapos Labour bai joinim cabinet or kamap Opposition Pati bilong Fiji.
Em ibin tok klia long ol pipol long despela bung olsem maski oli painim wanpela gutpela rot bilong stretim ol heve na kamapim wanpela wanpela Multi Pati Cabinet - ol heve bilong ol insait long wok politik bilong Fiji bai istap yet.
August 19, 2003
Radio Australia: www.abc.net.au/ra

Ol memba blong komuniti blong Penama Provins bae oli selebretem Provinsol Dei blong olketa long Sarere we i kam namba 16 Septemba, 2017.
Long Port Vila, Praem Minista Charlot Salwai Tabimasmas, bae i givim ofisol toktok folem ofisol prokram blong Penama Dei long Saralana Pak.
Aktiviti blong dei ia, bae i stat wetem wan pared we Vanuatu Mobael Fos bae i lidim stat long Indipendens Pak i ko long taon, maket, Asco Moto mo kasem Saralana pak ples we evri aktiviti blong dei ia bae i tekem ples long hem.
Ol nara aktiviti blong dei ia hemi inkludum wan dibet we topik blong hem oli kolem Respect, United mo Sustainable Panema.
Komiti blong selebreson ia, bae i provaedem pablik lanj mo, musik entatenmen mo ol kastom dans mo majik show.
Komiti blong selebreson i askem evri pipol blong Penama Provins we oli stap long Port Vila blong atendem Penama Dei stat long 8 oklok long moning kasem long safa.

Vanuatu bae i gat fes referendum insaed long 6 manis afta we palemen i bin passem wan bill blong jenjem Constitution tedei.
Ol MP i bin vot blong passem wan bill we bae i jenjem Constitution, mo pepes blong jenjes ia hem i blong impruvum stability long palemen.
Wan long ol bigfala jenj we bill ia i mekem hemi blong vacatem sit blong eni memba blong Palemen we oli ekspel or risaen long political pati we oli affiliate long hem.
Bill ia bae i needim ol independent members mo eni memba we hem wan no
... (370 chars skipped) ... 
wanem period blong taem we Palemen hem i no save passem wan motion.
Wan konsen we i kamap hemi blong Foma Praem Minista, Ishmael Kalsakau Mau’aukoro.
Hem i talem se Palemen i shud diskasem blong allowem ol motion long 12 manis afta long wan eleksen.
“Anything other than that bambae hem i save affektem raets blong ol membas blong Palemen blong oli freely jusum hu bambae i praem minista blong olgeta,” Hon Kalsakau i talem.
“I luk gud blong yumi kasem resolusen long ples ia, be long ples we text i 
... (370 chars skipped) ...
mentary secretary.
According long Atikol 86 blong Constitution, wan nasenol referendum hemi mas hapen sipos Palemen hemi passem wan Amendmen blong Constitution long saed blong Bislama, English mo French, Elektoral System o Palementri system.
Long Mandei, Palemen hemi passem Politikol Pati Registration Bill we hemi givim ol rul abaot responsibiliti blong ol political pati we i wantem contestem wan general eleksen.
Ol memba we oli stap lo Palemen long Mandei oli sapotem bil ia. Bill i gat 46 vote.

12 Rod Blong Gat Wan Hapi Famle
Yumi harem plante toktok long saed blong ol samting we i mekem famle i seraot. Be i moa gud yumi tokbaot ol rod blong mekem famle i hapi.
Stat long yia 1990 go kasem 2015, namba blong ol man Amerika we oli divos taem oli gat bitim 50 yia, i tu taem antap long ol yia bifo, mo namba blong ol man we oli divos taem oli gat bitim 65 yia, i tri taem antap.
Tingting blong ol papa mo mama i fasfas: Sam man we oli gat save, oli talem se i moa gud blong presem pikinini oltaem, be sam narafala oli talem se i moa gud blong mekem i strong long pikinini blong givhan long hem.
Plante yangfala oli no gat save mo gudhan we bambae oli nidim long laef blong olgeta.

Mared i save givim glad mo stap olwe.
Papa mo mama i save lanem olsem wanem blong stretem pikinini wetem lav.
Yangfala i save lanem blong gat gudhan we bambae hem i nidim long laef blong hem.

Vanuatu em save importim moa long 11 tausan tonnes blong rice long evri yia na gavman inau wok long karim aut wanpela polisi we bai lukim kantri ikatim daun import blong rice, na long wankain taim planim rice olsem hap blong food security long Vanuatu.
Olsem long ol arapela kantri long Pacific tu, sik suga or diabetes em wanpela bikpela wari long Vanuatu we rice tu i wanpela kaikai we isave kosim dispela sik.
Tasol Director blong Agriculture long Antoine Ravo itok gavman igat policy oli kolim tu long "Gudfala Kakae" policy we ipromotim helti kaikai we i karamapim ol lokol kaikai tu na ino long kakaim planti rice olgeta taim.
Em itok, olsem hap blong import 'substitution' tu, gavman i bringim seeds blong highlands kain rice na givim long ol fama long olgeta hap blong kantri long ol iken planim, na planti moa help.

Nomoa. Mifala olketa Christian, bat mifala no olketa Protestant. Hao nao olsem?
Olketa sei Protestantism hem “olketa church wea againstim biliv and teaching bilong Roman Catholic Church.” Hem tru, Olketa Jehovah’s Witness no agree witim olketa teaching bilong Catholic Church, bat mifala no ting long mifala olsem Protestant for tufala reason:
Plande teaching bilong olketa Protestant hem difren from wanem Bible hem teachim. Olsem example, Bible hem sei “wanfala God nomoa hem stap,” no wanfala Trinity. (1 Timothy 2:5; John 14:28) Hem sei tu, panis wea God bae givim long nogud pipol, hem for olketa dae and no savve laef bak. Hem bae no mekem olketa safa for olowe long hellfire.
—Psalm 37:9; 2 Thessalonica 1:9. Mifala no againstim or trae for changem Catholic Church or eni nara religion. Mifala preachim nomoa gud nius abaotem Kingdom bilong God, and trae for helpem pipol biliv strong long datfala gud nius. (Matthew 24:14; 28:19, 20) Mifala laekem nomoa for teachim pipol tru samting abaotem God and abaotem Bible.
—Colossae 1: 9, 10; 2 Timothy 2: 24, 25.

New Zealand i deklerem COVID fri nasen
New Zealand emi tekem aot evri rul blong COVID- 19 mo emi deklerem nasen ia emi fri long virus ia.
BBC news emi ripotem se, New Zealand emi tekem aot ol coronavirus rul blong hem afta we oli repotem se i nomo kat eni activ keses long kaontri.
Ripot i talem se anda long niufala rul ia , social distancing emi no wan rekuaemen, i nogat eni limit long ol pablik gathering be ol boda oli klos i stap yet.
Praem Minista, Jacinda Ardern emi talem se emi klad tumas blong harem nius ia. Hemi se, olgeta oli stap long wan posisen we emi sef mo i strong , be bae ino easi olsem bifo .Mrs Arden emi se, bae oli mas kat strong tingting ia blong bildim bak ekonomi blong olgeta.
Hemi kohed blong talem se, nomata we wok i no finis yet emia emi wan miles ston mo emi talem tankio long New Zealand.
“New Zealand emi kolo fes taem long lockdown long 25 March, we kaontri i bin stap long level fo mo naoia laef i muv i ko daon long level wan,” Praem Minista Arden i talem.
“Ol boda blong kaontri emi klos yet long ol foren travela mo ol rul blong emi stap yet se sapos eni man we i kam tru long kaontri bae mas kolo 14 day quarantine.”
Ms Ardern emi warnem kaontri se, bamabe oli save luk ol keses baken , nomata we oli no save aotem aot sik ia, bambae emi wan sustained effort.
“New Zealand emi bin recordem 1,154 konfem keses mo 22 deaths from Covid-19,” hemi talem.

Glosa hemi wanpela langguis we oli mekem we i stap long Interglossa (wanpela kaen plan blong wanpela nara langguis we oli bin pablik long 1943). Fes Glosa diksenari i bin pablik long 1978. Nao hemi kamaot long yumi sef, long grek rup "glossa" hemi mekem wan kain langguis o toktok. Hem i mekem helpim ol pipol blong olgeta kantri blong save tok olsem wanpela.

... (1540 chars skipped) ...

Long taim blong hapenim 1979, Ashby na Clark i bin mekim test long olgeta pipol i stap long taun we tupela i stap baiim. Long despla taim, tupela i bin mekim moa vokabul
... (1540 chars skipped) ...
est; sprint; kwek; spidi; velositi]; oku [ai]. Plis not se, olsem wanem wod oli stap long wan sentens i mekem olgeta i gat olgeta difren maning (olsem verb, ajektiv, na soa), exampol: "oku" i save mekem se "ai", "optikal", "lukluk wetem ai", "save lukluk", o "pekpek (wetem ai)".

Inap 8-pela manmeri tasol i winim Bikpela Tait, tasol bihain ol i kamap planti tausen. Na 352 yia bihain long Bikpela Tait, mama i karim Abraham. Yumi kisim save long olsem wanem God i truim tok promis bilong em na givim wanpela pikinini man long Abraham, em Aisak. Aisak i kamapim tupela pikinini man, na God i makim Jekop.
Jekop i kamapim 12-pela pikinini man na sampela pikinini meri. Tenpela pikinini man bilong Jekop i nolaik tru long liklik brata bilong ol, em Josep, na ol i salim em olsem wokboi nating i go long Isip. Bihain Josep i kamap bikman long Isip. Taim bikpela hangre i kamap, Josep i traim ol brata bilong em bilong painimaut olsem ol i senisim pasin bilong ol o nogat. Bihain, olgeta famili bilong Jekop, em lain Israel, ol i go i stap long Isip. Dispela samting i kamap 290 yia bihain long taim mama i bin karim Abraham.
Inap 215 yia ol Israel i stap long Isip. Taim Josep i dai pinis, ol i kamap ol wokboi nating long Isip. Bihain, mama i karim Moses, na long rot bilong Moses God i kisim bek ol Israel long Isip. Hap TU i stori long ol samting i bin kamap long 857 yia olgeta.

Praem Minista blong Vanuatu, Bob Loughman.
Fo yia polisi daereksen blong Kavman
Kavman i rilisim ofisiel polisi daereksen blong hem blong 2021 mo nekis fo yia.
Wan pres statemen we i kam long ofis blong Praem Minista i talem se hemia i beis long eria blong invesmen, agrikalja prodaksen mo value chain, edukeisen, helt mo ol nara sevis dilivari.
Mo hemia kaonsel blong ol minista ibin adoptem long miting blong hem long namba 21 May long Luganville.
Kavman i talem se prioriti polisi blong hem naoia hemi blong adresem impak blong COVID-19 mo ol nara disasta olsem Saeklon Harold mo ashfall long Tanna, we i afektem ekonomi mo laef blong ol pipol blong Vanuatu.
Mo long saed blong medium kasem long long tem, kavman blong Praem Minista Loughman i wantem fokas blong bildim bak ekonomi mo ol eria blong prioriti hemi, blong leftemap prodaksen long eria blong agrikalja, laefstok, fisheries mo forestri.
Strengthenem agrikalja value chain, olsem blong leftemap proses blong raw prodakt, leftemap investmen long agrikalja, promotem trade mo inter aelan trade, indastri mo cooperative, mo krietem ol ekonomik developmen zone.
Expandem seves sekta long bisnis long agrikalja sekta, mo ol nara sekta olsem finansiol seves.
Impruvum bisnis opotuniti mo investment environment, risilien infrastrakja, edukeisen fasiliti mo aksesibiliti, qualiti helt kea, seves dilivari, natural risos manejmen, mo sekuriti, pis mo jastis.

Prime Ministers Cup blong host long Vanuatu-Septemba
Vanuatu bae i hostem blong fastaem Melanesian Prime Ministers Cup long Port Vila long Septemba.
Bid we Vanuatu i putum blong ranem fes Prime Ministers Cup ia hemi karem sapot blong evri Melanesian kaontri long Pacific.
Prime Minista Bob Loughman nao i ofisioli lonjem kaon daon blong hae futbol tonamen ia long wiken long Melanesian Secretariat Grup ofis long Port Vila.
Hemia afta we Vanuatu hemi kasem grin laet blong ranem kompetisen afta long 
... (6 chars skipped) ... 
kses 8th Melanesian Secretariat Grup Sports Committee mo seken Sports Ministers miting long June hemia long Fiji.
Kompetisen ia fulap oli save long hem festaem olsem Melanesian Cup mo naoia name i jens i ko long niufala nem we hemi Prime Ministers Cup.
“Yumi okanasem fes eva Prime Ministers cup, mo tete mi kat ona ia olsem Prime minista blong ofisioli dilkarem countdown blong fes eva Prime Ministers cup,” Prime Minista Loughman i mekem anaonsmen.
Minista blong Sport, Willie Pakoa Satearoto i ask
... (6 chars skipped) ...
ol blong kopereit.
“Mi askem blong yumi evriwan i kopereit tugeta mo pripea from fes eva tonamen ia we yumi nao umi hostem,” Minista Satearoto i talem.
Vanuatu Football Federation Secretary General, Albert Manaroto, i talem se wok blong Freshwota stadium wok bae i en long August be i dipen sapos hemi redi blong hostem ol futbol mats.
Vanuatu, Niu Caledonia, Fiji, Solomon Islands mo Papua New Guinea bae i pat long futbol tunamen ia.
Ofisiol tunamen bae i tekem ples long Septemba 19 kasem 27 2022.

Stabilaesesen peimen blong ol wokman
Ministri blong Faenans mo Ekonomik Manejmen ibin provaedem VCCI wetem ol elektronik fom (long maekrosof Exsel fomat) blong ol bisnis we oli eligibol blong usum blong gat akses lo Stabilaesesen Peimen blong ol wokman blong olgeta. VCCI istap provaedem wan sapot seves mo bambae yu save faenem ol impoten dokumen long ples ia:
- ESP Aplikesen Fom (Exsek Spredshit – Plis notem Ikat 4 tab)
- Bisnis Jeklis – long ol dokumen we bambae yu nidim
- ESP Kaed – Hemia I givhan long yu blong andastanem hao nao bambae yu filimap fom (bambae mifala i aplodem I no long taem)
Sapose yu wandem blong askem ol kwesten long tisfala Stabilaesesen Peimen blong Wokman, mifala I gat fri hot laen we yu save kolem long 27543 bitwin 8am mo 3pm long ol wik dei.
Sapose you wandem blong mifala I givhan long yu blong complitim fom, yu save kam visitim Bisnis Sapot Senta we istap long Office blong VCCI long Port Vila blo toktok stret wetem ol ofisa blong givhan long yu. Plis karem ol dokumen we istap long jeklis antap taem yu stap kam long ofis.
VCCI bambae I stap patna wetem Dipatmen blong Turism blong mekem sua se ikat ol apropriet provinsel gavman ofisa blong provaedem provinsel bes bisnis sapot blong aksesem ESP – haoeva bambae hemia I no redi kasem Mei 2020.

LISMORE (AUSTRALIA) - Ol Digicel PNG Barramundis i bin gat bikpela win agensim Indonesia long T-20 gem long Lismore long New South Wales long Australia.
Ol PNG Barramundis i stap long tupela mak long winim East Asia Pacific T-20 regional championship bibain long bikpela win blong ol agensim Indonesia dispela morning.
PNG ibin paitim 250 ran long 20-pela ova na long bekim, ol Indonesia i paitim 65 ran tasol na PNG i bolim olgeta aut.
Dispela i namba tri win blong ol Barramundis bihain ol ibin winim Cook Islands na Fiji aste.
Assistant Coach, Rarua Dikana i tok ol i hamamas long tripela win blong ol pinis, tasol ol i laik long putim olgeta tingting blong ol long ol i mas winim dispela rijinal kompetisan long i go gen long Cricket World Cup. [RadioAustralia]

1. ?Fasin nogud i stat olsem wanem?

Nasional dei blong ol jifs we i stap long 5 march 2017, hemi wan okesen blong niu president blong Ripablik blong Vanuatu FR Baldwin Lonsdale blong mitim wan long ol respected jif blong Tanna we everyman i save, jif Isaac Wan. Tufala Jifs mit long independent park mo tufala i marj wetem ol counterparts jif long araon long kaontri blong makem jif dei long Port Vila. Jif Wan hemi wan long ol ae jif blong Jhon Frum long Tanna mo tu hemi commanda blong polis blong Jhon frum. Hemi kam long port Vila accompagnied long wan long body kat we i werem full millitary uniform.

Peij ia hem i brifli aotlaenem sam long ol most komon loa mo regulesen we oganaesen blong yu mo / o ol emploi oli save brekem o nidim proteksen long hem, taem i nogat gudfala nolej o kontrol.
Data proteksen
Hem i rilet i go long pesonal infomesen long ol kastoma, emploi, ol peisen o ol narafala individual.
Praevesi mo elektronik komunikesen regulesen
Hem i rilet i go long samfala raet blong ol konsuma mo ol bisnes blong selektem wanem ol komunikesen olgeta oli laekem o wis blong risivim, hemia ol restriksen long yus blong lokesen data mo ol smilila eria.
Kompiuta misyus
Hem i rilet long ol anotoraesed akses i go long ol kompiuta sistem, inkludum haking.
Kontrak loa
Hem i riet long ol obligesen anda long kontrak bitwin oganaesesen mo / ol individual, we hem i involvem konfidensialiti, korek storej mo handling blong ol data mo simila konsideresen.
Intelektual propeti
Hem i rilet long ol anotoraes kopi o plejerism blong ol ligali -protekted material, konten, ol disaen, ol imej mo ol prodak mo ol sevis.
Ilisit material
Daonloding, storej o transmisen blong konten / imej blong ol abiusiv, vaelen, seksual, het, resist o homofobik neja blong ol emploi long ol. divaes o sistem blong yu.
Frod
Disepsen we i kam onlaen blong faenansol gein (mani).

POT MOSBI - Ol lida blong Melanesia ino ken harim ol gris toktok blong Indonesia na larim emi bagarapim tingting blong ol Melanesian pipal blong West Papua i joinim Melanesian Spiahed Grup (MSG).
Despla em askim blong Fred Mambrasar, Free West Papua Campaign-Papua New Guinea Coordinator bihaenim ol nius ripot olsem Indonesia iwok long strongim nau ol wokbung wantem ol Melanesian kantri.
Mr Mambrasar i mekim despla toktok bihaen long Indonesian foran minista Retno LP Marsudi ibin tokim Foran Minista blong Vanuatu Sato Kilman olsem Indonesia igat bikpla namba tru long ol Melnaensian pipal winim olgeta Melanesian pipal long Pacific.
Toktok blong Foran Minista Marsudi ibin kamap tu long wankaen taem we ol memba kantri blong MSG nau i redi long application blong ol west papua pipal long joinim Melanesian Spiahed Grup.
Mrs Marsudi ibin mekim despla toktok blong en long namba 60 miting blong Asian-African Conference Commemoration long wik igo pinis.
Ol Foran Minista blong ol MSG kantri ibin stap tu long despla miting long Jakarta. [RadioAustralia]

Ol lida blong Morobe provins long Papua New Guinea isalim wanpla peition igo long gavman long em imas bihainim pastaim long Wafi-Golpu mine iken go het long provins.
Displa toktok blong Wafi-Golpu Memorandum of Understanding we PNG gavman ibin sainim wantaim ol mine divelopers las wik igat toktok yet longen.
Morobe gavana Ginson Saonu itok Morobe provinsial asembli o Tutumung ibin sindaun aste na pasim tok olsem nogat wanpla wok bai kamap inap long gavman ikisim tingting blong ol papagraun na provinsial gavman.
Mr Saonu itok Tutumung emi makim maus blong ol papagraun na pipol blong Morobe provins na sapos gavman ino givim luksave long ol askim blong ol, bai Wafi-Golpu mine ino inap long kamap.

Ia. Mifala biliv long Jesus, wea hem sei: “Mi nao road, mi nao truth, and mi nao laef. Mi nomoa road for man go long Dadi long heven.
” (John 14:6) Mifala biliv Jesus lusim heven for kam long earth and hem givim perfect laef bilong hem olsem sakrifaes, wea datwan hem price for sevem pipol. (Matthew 20:28) From hem dae and laef bak, datwan mekem chance for olketa wea showimaot faith long hem savve kasem laef olowe. (John 3:16) Mifala bilivim tu, Jesus hem King wea rul insaed Kingdom bilong God long heven, wea klosap nao Kingdom hia bae mekem full earth for garem peace. (Revelation 11:15) Nomata olsem, mifala bilivim toktok bilong Jesus taem hem sei: “Dadi long heven hem winim mi.
” (John 14:28) So mifala no worshipim Jesus, bikos mifala no biliv Jesus hem Olmaeti God.

Bihain long driver blong wanpla long ol taxi blong en ibin bagarapim taxi blong en na stilim moni long tuple yia igo pinis, Arisen Wakendui, husait em mama blong 6pla pikinini inau mekim disisin long lusim wok lo opis na ronim wanpla long ol taxi blong en insiat long Port Moresby.
Ms Wakendui ibin wok olsem wanpla Human Resource Manager blong wanpla kampani nau emi hamamas long ronim wanpla taxi blong en na halivim femili blong en.
Emi tok emi bin stat ronim taxi long namba 16 dei blong mun September 2019 na ibin gat ol salens we emi bungim, tasol nau, emi gat planti ol poroman taxi driver na emi hamamas long mekim displa kain wok.
Ms Wakendui isave wok long waitim ol kastomas blong em long Hohola.

Long age group blong 0 kasem 13 years yumi stap lukluk olgeta olsem ol pikinini we I stap long gud care blong yumi ol parents or ol person responsible.
Long wan record blong police , Plante long ol pikinini we I kam victim blong nogud fasin ia hemi ol pikinini long age group blong 7, 8 mo 9 years.
Polis hemi wantem letem public I save se time yu stap showem private part blong yu , touchem nogud wan pikinini hemi wan offence finis from yu stap ko againsem right blong hem mo hemi no long concern blong pikinini ia .
Kind fasin olsem I stap happen plante long ol pikinini we mama I karem mo ko stap wetem wan narafala man mo ol adopted pikinini.
King fasin olsem hemi save affectem whole life blong wan pikinini mo mekem bae hemi fillim se hemi shame, hemi fraet mo gat plante narafala tinktink we I save spoilem hem long skul .

Kirap long dispela mun, Laip na Wok Autim Tok Miting Wok Buk bai i no inap moa long kamapim tripela rot bilong autim tok. Nau em bai kamapim sampela eksampel bilong toktok we i gat askim, skripsa, na wanpela askim bilong i stap olsem link na em inap opim rot bilong mekim gobek. Long olgeta wik, bai i gat wanpela vidio tasol bilong soim eksampel bilong autim tok. Pablisa yet i ken makim wanem tul em i laik yusim bilong skulim man—long namba 1 visit o long taim em i mekim gobek. Na tu, wok buk bai kamapim eksampel bilong toktok em pablisa i ken mekim long namba 2 o namba 3 gobek visit. Dispela senis bai helpim yumi long mekim gut wok bilong skulim “olgeta manmeri em bel bilong ol i gutpela long kisim laip oltaim.”—Ap 13:48.
Asainmen Bilong Sumatin: Ol sumatin i mas bihainim ol tok i stap long eksampel bilong autim tok; ol i ken mekim narapela tok long narapela pasin sapos instraksen bilong miting i tok olsem.

Ol family i glad long riten blong ol kru
Ol famili blong olgeta kru long turis bot i hapi long riten blong olgeta.
Olgeta family memba ia i soem glad hat blong olgeta wetem wan welkam hom bana we oli stanap wetem long Tagabe Ranabaot blong welkamem ol kru memba ia.
I kat wan totol blong 126 Ni-Vanuatu kru we oli stap long turist bot mo oli kasem bak Port Vila long yestedei.
Hemi wan spesel airlift aot long Philippines i kam long Vanuatu olsem pat blong COVID-19 repatriation prokram blong kavman.

Taem arejmen i stap tekem taem P&O Cruises hemi komitim hem fulwan blong karem ol kru ia i kam hom sef.
P&O Cruises i talem se hemi gat wan taet rileisensip wetem Vanuatu mo talem tankiu long kavman blong save wok kolosap wetem olgeta blong karem bak ol kru ia i kam hom.

Active East Epi andawota volcano
East Epi andawota volcano i wan active volcano naoia.
Volcano Scientific Ofisa long Geo- Hazards Dipatmen, Dan Tari i talem long VBTC Nius.
“So andawota volcano blong East Epi hemi wan Dormant volcano(hemi quite mbe hemi save muvmuv long fuija). Erapsen i bin hapen long 2004 mo hemi stap kwaet mo naoia hemi kerap bakegen. So naoia hemi kam olsem active volcano naoia,” Mr Tari i talem.
“Hemi nomol blong volcano i hapen olsem long graon mo solwota. “Taem i kat moa 
... (735 chars skipped) ... 
o i waet i ko kamaot i no long semak ples mbe nara ples bageken we bae yumi se 20-30mita olsem ia longwe long fes wan,” Eria Secretary blong Saot Epi, Timothy Andre i talemaot long VBTC Nius.
“Mifala i stap antap long bush mo stap wajem i waet nomo i ko antap. Hemia wan samting we hemi festaem blong pipol long Epi i luk, oli stanap mo stap tinkbaot situasen blong Ambae mo oli stap talem se sapos yumi olsem ia bae yumi stat blong muv nao. Fulap i kat ol negativ tinktink nao blong stat blong muv. 
... (735 chars skipped) ...
long solwota taem hemi muvmuv, bae hemi mekem wave i kasem ol coastal eria blong yumi. So i kat ripot vinis long moning, ol pipol raon long east blong Epi oli se oli luk sam wave folem explosen. So fraet blong yumi naoia hemi blong pipol i stap alert oltaem from nogud hemia i mekem wan nara bigfala aktiviti. So threat blem wetem tsunami folem earthquake.”
Mr Dan i talem se i kat tu andawota volcano long Vanuatu.
Wan hemi East Epi andawota volcano mo nara wan Kuwae we i stap bitwin Epi mo Tongoa.

Koj blong Niu Ziland, Darren Bazeley, i mekem wan jenis nomo long tim we i winim Vanuatu 4-0, wetem Ben Waine i kambak long stat laen-ap blong riplesem Max Mata.

... (349 chars skipped) ... 
ong Qatar.

Viktri blong New Ziland istat eli long 8 minit nomo taem Liberato Cacace i mekem wan fri-kik we i kasem pos, i go stret long leg blong Finn Surman blong skorem fes gol blong hem blong kantri blong hem long namba 4 apirens.
Tahiti i tekem klosap 20 minit blong mekem wan threat long gol blong Niu Ziland, taem Tyler Bind
... (349 chars skipped) ...
o mbe i luk shot blong hem i go ova long krosba.
Eni hop blong wan comeback blong Tahiti i bin end taem Player of the Match Cacace i givim wan kros sut long Waine blong sko bagegen.
Barbarouses tu i kasem dabol blong hem sam minit afta.
Niu Ziland i sud inkris sko blong olgeta, be sam desperate defend mo poor finishing i mekem ino posibol.
Darren Bazeley mo tim blong hem naoia i stap wet blong faenem hu bambae i agensem olgeta long final, taem Fiji i tekem Vanuatu long sekon semifinal blong dei.

Simcard rijistresen
Ol mobile fon kastoma blong Vodafone mo Digicel oli save lusum akses long seves sapos oli no rijiistarem simcard blong olgeta wetem stret ID bifo en blong yia.
Hemi folem wan ‘Sim Card Registration Regulation Order namba 105 blong 2022’ we Telecommunication mo Radiocommunication and Broadcasting Regulator(TRBR) hemi givim.
Instraksen ia hemi kam long regulator folem wan tingting blong Kavman blong stopem ol illegal aktiviti we i stap hapen wetem yus blong ol mobile fon.
VBTC Nius hemi awea se diskasen blong rijistration blong ol simcard hemi stat taem i gat plante pipol i tok nogud long ol nara pipol inkludim ol lida long social media(fesbuk) we oli no yusum stret nem blong olgeta.
Mbe i gat konsen tu se fasin blong monitarem mo tekem aksen akensem wan user hemi save ko akensem Constitutional raet blong wan sitisen.
Vodafone Vanuatu Limited i talem se ol sem kad we ol kastoma i yusum naoia oli mas rijistarem bagegen bifo en blong October sapos no bae oli disconektem seves blong simcard ia.
Kampani Digicel hemi no talemaot yet wanem taem bae hemi statem rijistresen blong ol simcard blong hem.
TRBR i talem se olgeta pipol we yusum mobile fon oli mas rijistarem ol simcard wetem wan ID we hemi stret nem blong olgeta mo ples we oli stap long hem.

So blong kliarem long yumi, Pacer-plus i kam fastaem mo long Wikipedia oli se ‘The Pacific Agreement on Closer Economic Relations (PACER)’ mo hemia i minim se hemi wan akrimen blong ol pasifik kantri we oli memba blong ‘Pacific Island Forum’ we Australia mo New Zealand insaed mo wok blong akrimen ia blong givim wan strakja long fasin blong d
... (368 chars skipped) ... 
nem pepa ia.
Nomata we ofis blong ‘Office of the Chief Trade Advisor’ hemi talem se Pacer-plus i kat plante benefit, PANG mo krup blong hem oli stap kampen akensem.
Las wik Vanuatu we hemi wan memba blong PIF i talem se bae hemi no saenem pepa ia fastaem mo oli wantem kat plante taem blong lukluk tru bifo oli saenem pepa ia.

... (368 chars skipped) ...
 we OXFARM i mekem we oli kolem ‘PACER Plus and its Alternatives’ i soem se i kat plante fasin blong mekem tred mo i gud faenem wan rod we i stret spos ol narawan i no wok.
Blong andastandem gud topik ia i go moa, yumi mas ridim plante ol pepa we ‘New Zealand Foreign Affairs & Trade’ i raetem mo ridim ol pepa we ol difren krup long pasifik ol raetem nomata oli akri o no, be emia nao bae yu save skelem ol tingting mo save moa samting long topik ia Pacer-plus.

Ol risk
- Fisikol los o teft blong ol mobael divaes – oli no nidim riplesemen be oli ol data long devaes we oli gat potensel blong oli yusum.
- Malwe – hem i save putum divaes long denja mo ol narafala divaes we hem i konek i go long olgeta (inkludum imel) mo ful IT infrastrakja mo sekuriti blong bisnes proses blong yu mo ol transaksen. Hemia hem i wan risal blong fasin blong daonlodem ol phis
... (437 chars skipped) ... 
denja, lusum reputesen, non- komplians wetem data regulesen mo iven blakmel o oli holem olgeta ransom (weta koporet o wan individual).
Advaes long yus blong mobael divaes
- Mekem evriwan we oli gat yus blong wan kampani mobael divaes (o otoraesed blong yusum divaes blong olgeta nomo) oli responsibol blong ol biheiva mo ol aksen blong olgeta.
- Inkludum yus blong mobael divaes long ol kampani bisnes, long kampani hanbuk.
- Mekem sua se ol divaes oli protekted wetem wan PIN, we hem i strong blong 
... (437 chars skipped) ...
 inkorek PIN o wan host o narafala fija blong ol divaes tedei

- Fisikali protektem divaes long ol pablik ples
- Mekem sua se Wi-Fi hem i sekua, o yusum wan data dongel
- Yu mas wari long ol ‘solda sefa’
- Yu mas gat ol strik poisi long sef yusej – inkludum imel, intenet yus, sosol netwok mo ol app – blong avoidem malwe i infektem.

No suicide ripot system
Vanuatu i nogat wan ripot system blong ripotem ol ded blong ol pipol we oli plan o minim blong tekem aot laef blong olgeta(suicide).
Nurse Incharge long Mind Care Unit long Vila Central Hospital, Lawrence Hinge Leo i talemaot long VBTC Health Tokbak show i no longtaem.
Mr Leo i talem se i kat plante ded blong suicide we i stap hapen be i nogat klia data ripot.
Hemi talem se olgeta we oli stap karemaot laef blong olgeta tete hemi age blong 20 i ko antap.
“Long deit yumi no
... (959 chars skipped) ... 
i stap bae hemi kilim hem wan. So yumi mas lukluk gud long ol pipol olsem we oli stap long nid blong toktok plante long olgeta. Sam long ol saen we yu save luksave long wan man we i kat plan blong suicide hemi, wan i talemaot ol storian ia. Hemi save talem ol stori ia evritaem, samtaem pa yu luk man ia i wokem kros, hemi drink plante, hemi stap hem wan nomo o kontinu involv long ol rabis aktiviti. So toktok ia eh uncle yu oraet? hemi rili impoten.”
Folem hae namba blong ol kes, helt otoriti i st
... (959 chars skipped) ...
rt Vila mo Santo.
Wan kola i talem se kavman i nid blong fokas moa long suicide blong helpem kaontri long futja.
Mental Health tim i visitim mo mekem awenes long ol skul long Sanma long eli Septemba ia long Santo East, Tata Secondary, Hog Harbour Secondary, Nanduitu Secondary, Matevulu College mo Lycee De Luganville wetem ol komuniti.
I kat wan estimeit blong 703,000 pipol long wan yia i tekem aot own laef blong olgeta long Wol.
Vanuatu hemi rank namba 13 long wol from nogud fasin blong suicide.

i no gat narapela nem long graun em God i makim namel long ol manmeri bilong kisim bek yumi.
”—Aposel 4:12.Taim ol manmeri i kamap Witnes Bilong Jehova, ol i kisim baptais long nem bilong Jisas.—Matyu 28:18, 19.
Mipela i save prea long nem bilong Jisas.—Jon 15:16.
Mipela i bilip olsem Jisas em i Het, o man i gat namba long bosim olgeta manmeri.—1 Korin 11:3.
Tasol long planti rot, mipela i narapela kain long ol lotu i gat nem Kristen. Olsem, mipela i bilip olsem Baibel i tok Jisas em i Pikinini Bilong God, na i no wanpela hap bilong God Triwan. (Mak 12:29) Mipela i no bilip olsem man i gat wanpela spirit i no save dai, o long Baibel i tok God bai givim bikpela pen long ol man long helpaia inap oltaim, o long ol bikman bilong lotu i mas i gat ol biknem i mekim ol i winim ol narapela, nogat.—Saveman 9:4, 5; Esekiel 18:4; Matyu 23:8-10.

Chief blong Bougainville Police Service, Francis Tokura itok em i hamamas tru long ol sait long sekiuriti long taim blong independence referendum ikam inap nau.
Em itok, em ibin raun stat long Buka long north igo daun long Buin long south na em ino kisim wanpela ripot long wanpela tabol long sait long referendum.
Mr Tokura itok, em inarapela tru long olgeta ileksan long wanem ol pipol na ol lida ilukim dispela vout olsem em blong ol yet na oli laikim olgeta samting imas kamap gut.
Em itok, pastaim long oli kamap long Bougainville, ol 50 ofisa blong Royal PNG Police Constabulary we oli go givhan long referendum sekiuriti ol ifret, tasol ol Bougainvillean i akseptim ol na i wok gut wantaim ol.

Sande
Sande i nambaseven de bilong wik, o de bihain tru bilong wik.
Long sampela kantri (olsem Amerika na Inglan), wik i stat long Sande, na Sande i nambawan de bilong wik.
Nem Sande i kam long Tok Inglis Sunday. Dispela i min Sun’s Day, o de bilong San. Bipo bipo tru long Yurop, ol i lotuim san. Ol i tingting san i wanpela masalai, o got.
Long planti kantri ol i no wok long Sande. Sande wantaim Sarere ol i mekim wiken, o hap bilong wik i no gat wok.
Long lotu bilong ol Kristen, Sande i de antap bilong lotuim. Planti manmeri bilong Kristen ol i go long sios, o haus lotu bilong ol Kristen.

Seasonal wok country liason ofisa
Tu Country Liason Ofisa blong lukluk long Welfare blong ol Ni-Vanuatu Seasonal woka i stap naoia long New Zealand mo Australia.
Commissioner blong Labour, Murielle Meltenoven i talemaot long VBTC Nius.
Long New Zealand, Recognised Seasonal Employer (RSE) scheme Liason ofisa hemi Olivia Fleur Johnson mo long Australia hemi Patrice Kuatonga, Senior Labour Ofisa.
Mrs Meltenoven i talem se Mr Kuatonga i leko kaontri long eli Decemba ia.
“Liason Ofisa blong yumi long New Zealand i tekem ap position long Sepetemba 30 2022 mo hemi stap karemaot wok blong hem naoia,”
“Mr Kuatonga bae i tekem ap position long Canberra mo bae hemi stap tri manis mo afta bae yumi plesem hem i ko long wan long ol state we i kat fulap wokman i stap long hem.”
Mrs Meltenoven i talem se ol woka ovasi i sud wok wetem tufala ofisa blong Labour taem oli kat oli kat ol arem nogud long wok ples.

Nasonal weta: Tosdei 27 August
Klaodi wetem laet ren mo sawa bae i foldaon ova long saot mo pat blong sentrol aelan wetem patli klaodi mo smol sawa i posibol ova long ol nara pat blong kaontri.
Vanuatu Meteorology mo Geo-Hazards Department i talem se laet mo fres win bae i bloa long daereksen blong is-saotis win ova long grup.
Dipatmen ia i talem se top tempereja long dei blong tudei bae hem i stap long 27 dikri daon long saot mo 30 dikri antap long not. Minimam tempereja long tunaet bae hem i stap long 21 dikri daon long saot mo 24 dikri antap long not.
Long solwora, is-saotis win wetem spid blong 21 kasem 25 knot wetem raf solwora wetem haet blong 2.5 mita ova long everi kostol wota. Pua visibiliti ova long ol pat blong sentrol, channel mo saoten wota.

Plande long olketa pipol blong Shortland Islands long boda eria blong Solomon Islands kolsap long Autonomous Region blong Bougainville long Papua New Guinea, olketa i tekem finis AstraZeneca vaccine nila agensim dispela sik Covid-19.
Wabfala komiuniti lida long Shortlands, John Kotaru hem se kolsap evri pipol long Shortlands olketa tekem finis disfala nila and bae olketa tekem meke 2 dose long July.
Solomon Islands hem bin tekem 24,000 AstraZeneca vaccine anda long Covax facility wea olketa givim long olketa frontline workers and long olketa pipol long boda eria wetem Bougainville inkludim Choiseul and Ontong Java long Malaita Outer Islands.
Bihaen long ofisol lonch long last wik, gavman hem stat fo rolam aot vaccination wetem disfala Sinopharm vaccine blong China long Honiara yestede, wea olketa Chinese national nao go nila long hem, wetem samfala Solomon pipol tu.
Kam kasem distaem, Solomon Islands hem bin rekodim 20 Covid-19 keis insaet long quarantine, bat hem no garem eni komuniti transmission wea hem minim Solomon Islands hem free iet from disfala coronavirus sik.

Long wan outreach blong COVID-19 vaccine roll out long Tutuba aelan, Sanma Public Helt i talem se ol komuniti lida long Sanma i mas mekem raet choice blong ol pipol blong olgeta i save risivim COVID vaccine.

... (13 chars skipped) ... 
e hem ia hem i mein mesej.

... (13 chars skipped) ...
to.

Dastawe Jehovah sei long Provebs 27:11: “Pikinini blong mi, sapos yu kamap waes, bae mi hapi, an bae mi save ansarem eniwan [“man,” NW] hu hemi tokspoelem mi.”

Ol stakeholders long sait long Papua New Guinea by-election blong Regional Seat blong Bougainville ol i hamamas long wanpela ripot we Bougainville Women's Federation ibin karim aut long dispela by-eleksan long January igo February dispela yia.
Project Coordinator wantaim BWF, Margarette Kiroha itok riport blong ol long election observation long sait long Violence Against Women ol ibin putim go na toktok longen long wanpela Round Table Stakeholders Meeting long Port Moresby.
Ms Kiroha itok ol stakeholders iken yusim sampela infomesen insait long ol painim aut we istap insait long dispela ripot long mekim sampela senis we bai ken help long mekim gut moa ol ileksen long bihain taim long sait long ol meri.
Bougainville Women's Federation em iwok aninit long wanpela Act blong ABG palament, na em isave kisim halvim ikam long National Democratic Institute long Amerika - em wanpela nonprofit, nonpartisan organization we iwok long sapotim na strongim ol democratic institutions raun long world.

Nius Hetlain:
Angau Moiri Senta baksait long Lae Angau haus sik, i tok tete ol i karim 80 pela pikinini husait i no kisim sik HIV long ol mama husait i gat HIV.
Rijeniol Medikal Offisa bilong HIV na STI, Dr Elsie Ryan i tok long 2007 yet ol i i lukautim moa long 400pela mama igat sik HIV. Dispela ol meri i kisim tritmen long mama pikinini program.
Tete long Ke Senta ol i sanap wantaim kantri long tingim Wol AIDS dei.
Lon nambawan taim tru, ol pipol bilong ol liklik ples lo Bogia Distrik Madang, i kisim halivim long ol ai dokta. Dispela wok halivim i kam aninit lo Lukaut blo Weld Visen Madang. Ol ai dokta i sekim tu taosen man meri i gat hevi lon ai na ol i givim ol ai glas fri.
Univesiti of Teknologi i kirapim wok risech i go insait lo ol arapela kain enegi o rot bilong mekim pawa.
Na long spots nius,
Presiden bilong Hekari Socca Asosiesion, John Kapi Nato, PNG Futbol Assosiesion i rausim em long wok.

Foma Praem Minista, Leit Donald Kalpokas, i kasem burial long home aelan blong hem long Lelepa tede.
Bodi blong Leit Kalpokas ibin stap wetem Jif mo komuniti blong Lelepa long last naet kasem tedei.
Long yesterdei ibin kat kastom seremoni we Jif blong Lelepa i mekem long Lelepa landing bifo hemi risivim bodi blong Leit Kalpokas long han blong kavman.
Mo oli pul long kenu wetem bodi blong hem iko long home aelan blong hem, olsem wan kastom fasin.
Hemi wan well respekted lida, mo komuniti blong Lelapa oli bin welkamem hem wetem respekt, mo stap tuketa wetem hem, bifo ol famili i berem hem.

Praem minista Charlot Salwai mo minista blong health, Jack Norris, tufala offisioli leiem daon faondesen blong dispenseri blong Brenwe skul mo ol village we oli stap raon long tuesede last wik.
Mani blong dispenseri, hemi kasem 4 milien vatu mo gavman blong Vanuatu nao, bae hemi givim mani ia folem request blong ol chief mo pipol blong Brenwe igo long MP blong olgeta, Jerome Ludvaune. Dispenseri bae hemi mekem se ol pikinini blong skul mo pipol blong Brenwe bae oli save kasemtritmen long ples blong olgeta nomo. Naoia oli stap go long Aid Post blong Unmet o hospital long Norsup. Mr Salwai i talem se long ol bigman blong health olsem DG blong health se hemi no wandem lukim nalumlum i gru long ston. Hemi se hemi wandem lukim dispenseri hemi kirap long yia ia sapos ikat mani blong hem, hemi redi finis. Ol chief mo pipol blong Brenwe, oli talem se sins indipendens, hemi festaem we oli lukim wan praem minista wetem wan bigfala delegesen mo oli talem tankiu long fes visit blong Mr Salwai wetem dispenseri blong olgeta. PM Salwai i visitim eria blong Not West Malekula long las tuesde wetem minista blong health, minista blong education, Jean Pierre Nirua, ol DG mo ol bigman blong Malampa province.

Olgeta Port Vila Football Association premia divisen las wiken i lukim 3 maj i kik off long Port Vila Stadium.
Fes maj blong dei Tafea FC hemi kam blong winim wan strong Shepherds United saed long 3-1.
Tafea nao hemi bin openem sko thru long straeka Leo Moli long fes haf, blong putum sko long haf taem long 1-0 long feva blong Tafea.
Sekon haf i stat, Leo hemi addem sekon poen blong hem, be i lukim Shepherds thru long Ronaldo Wilkins hemi sko daerek long wan kona kik blong putum sko long 2-1.
Taem we Shepherds hemi stap push blong faenem wan ikwalaesa, Alista Kalip hemi makem namba 3 poen blong Tafea long wan kaonta atak.
Sekon maj blong dei, Galaxy FC i kam blong winim Ifira long wan sko blong 2-0.
Kolkipa blong Ifira, Kalo Firiam hemi putum wan own goal eli long fes haf, blong putum sko long haf taem long 1-0 long feva blong Galaxy.
Long sekon haf Henry Namatak hemi addem sekon poen blong Galaxy blong silim win blong klab blong hem ova long Ifira. Las maj blong dei, BSP Amicale hemi muv i kam sekon long klasmen wetem wan 2-1 win ova long Tupuji Imere.
Klamen naoia i lukim:
1, Tafea 15
2. BSP Amicale 9
3. Galaxy 8
4. Ifira Black Bird 6
5. Yatel 2
6. Tupuji Imere 2
7. Shepherds United 2
8. Erakor Golden Star 2

Suprim Kot i bin sakemaot long 12 Epril klem blong 2 famli weh i bin lisimaot kraon i go long sam investa afta weh i faenemaot se tufala i bin karem mani blong kraon ia finis.
Tufala famli ia, anda long nem Kaltatak mo Kalmet Kampani Limited i klem seh Marcel Andre Brugger mo Fabienne Brugger oli no bin pem premium blong lis blong kraon ia weh hem i VT 18,000,000.
Kampani blong tufala famli ia i klem tu seh folem agrimen weh oli mekem wetem ol investa ia, tufala lessees i sut pem VT 3,000,000 evri yia i go long olgeta be oli no bin pem stat long 2015 kasem 2023.
Suprim Kot i faemem aot seh tufala investa ia i bin karem wan lon long ANZ Bank mo pem lis blong kraon ia finis i go long tufala famili ia long 16 Januari 2015. Beh from tufala i feil blong pem bak lon, ANZ Bank i karem paoa tru long kot blong salem bak kraon ia.
Kot i faenemaot tu seh tufala famili ia i nogat raet blong ol investa ia oli pem olgeta VT 3,000,000 evri yia from tufala i no mitim ol kontisen weh i stap long agrimen blong olgeta.
Folem kleim weh Kaltatak mo Kalmet Kampani Limited i mekem, tufala investa ia, Marcel Andre Brugger mo Fabienne Brugger i mekem wan apli blong Kot i sakemaot klem ia.
Suprim Kot Jaj, Oliver Saksak i rul long feva blong Marcel mo Fabienne Brugger mo sakemaot klem blong Kaltatak mo Kalmet Kampani Limited.

Long twitter long wik ia, stori blong Liam Fox we hemi wan jenelis blong ABC Pacific Affairs hemi mekem wan video long laef blong pipol long Tanna folem situesen blong EL Nino we yumi stap fesem naoia long kantri.
Liam Fox hemi ripotem se ol pikinini nao oli stat blong kasem ol problem olsem sik bunbun mo narafala kaen sik we El Nino mo drae sisen i stap kosem olsem i nokat wota mo ol kaikai i no gro gud.
Medikel Superintenden blong Lenakel Hospital, Dokta Robert Vocor i talem se naoia oli risivim plante kes finis blong sik bunbun mo problem blong nokat nutrisen i kam bikwan mo oli nidim plante ol gudfala kaikai.
Source: http://www.abc.net.au/news/2015-11-03/young-children-hardest-hit-in-vanuatu-drought-driven-by-el-nino/6906560

Mr Tamau i talem se plante taem ol fama i mas wokbaot longwe antap long hil blong moa long 2KM wetem ol kakae blong kasem ship pasis long solwota.

Kol blong ol lawyer i honest long wok
Chief Justice blong Vanuatu i kol long ol lawyer blong oli honest long pratis o wok blong olketa.
Vincent Lunabek i mekem apil ia taem hemi openem court session blong yia ia 2021.
Mr Lunabek i talem se hemi festaem blong hemi reisem point ia from se court i kontinu blong risivim komplen long pablik abaot pefomens blong ol lawyer se hemi no ethical.
Hemi talem se oli stat blong taetem ap administresen blong court blong karem bak trast long pipol.
“Rikod i soem se i kat wan total blong 25 komplein we i bin sabmit i kam mo discipline komiti bae i dil wetem olketa,” Chief Justice Vincent i talem.
“Aot long 25 komplen ia, seven long olketa oli involv long ol ofens olsem misuse blong trast mani mo unethnical mo prosessional behavior.
“Ol lawyer we oli no sevesem gud ol klaen blong olketa oli mas disciplinim olketa.
“Disaplin hemi olfala fasen blong yusum mbe naoia i kat wan trening prokram we bambae i helpem pefomens blong ol lawyer.”
Hed blong Judiciary long Vanuatu i wonem ol legal praktisina se praktis blong loa hemi honoroble.
“Practis blong loa i mas be honorable mo pipol i expektem yumi blong provaedem quality, ethnical, asesible, cost efectiv seves i ko long ol pipol,” hemi talem.
“From hemi risponsilibiti blong yumi blong upholdem mo promotem loa.
I kat ova 50 lawyer long kaontri.

“The Territories of Life videos were key to sparking discussions around our own territorial defence issues in the northern Ecuadorian Amazon at legal trainings with indigenous leaders and youth. It’s one thing to hear second-hand that companies are deceitful and cause huge impacts, but seeing people like us from all over the world talking about their personal experiences really hit home. Oswaldo Nenquimo, Ecuador

Namba tri Lapita Festival this year ba hemi hapen lo sem taem wetem Mini-games stat lo 5th December kasem 14th December 2017 lo Korman.
Storian blo Lapita hemi kavremap Pacific from evidens blo ol man ya yumi faenem stat lo PNG hemi kam kasem yumi lo Vanuatu mo go kasem Polynesia.
Ba lo taem ya tu e gat ‘slow food’ exhibition we ba hemi stap olsem pat blo Lapita festival we ba yumi soem ol difren kaen kakae we yumi gat lo Vanuatu.
Ba e gat tu ol difren cultural activity we hemi inkludum ol kastom danis, demonstration lo ol kastom fasin blo mekem ol samting olsem basket, mat, carving, ol jen/nekles, magic show, mo sam lo ol kastom kakae blo yumi, mo plante mo.
Lapita festival Comiti hemi stap askem sapos you we you intres blo tek pat lo Lapita Festival lo yia ya blo kam antap lo Kaljoral Senta mo givim name blo you mo wanem we you wantem mekem.
Hemi wan janis blo yumi blo promotem ol difren kaen samting/kastom we yumi gat lo ol nara kaontri lo rijen.
Blo save mo information about event ya, kam lo Vanuatu Kaljoral Senta mo askem.

i wokboi nating bilong yupela olgeta.”

Jisas, long maus bilong aposel Pol, Em i mekim wankain toktok long Timoti. Long 1 Timoti 3:1-7 aposel Pol i putim ples klia olsem, man i laik kamap lida bilong sios em mas i stap man i bihainim pasin i oposit long p
... (1810 chars skipped) ...
sem Pikinini Bilong Man, Hetman na oana bilong sios, i bihainim. Pasin bilong lidaman bilong sios bilong Jisas em i oposit long pasin bilong ol lidaman bilong dispela graun.
Em olsem na yumi i laik i stap lidaman namel long ol manmeri long femili bilong God, orait yumi mas i stap man i wokabaut long pasin i oposit long pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong dispela graun na i oposit long ol lidaman bilong dispela graun. Long dispela rot tasol bai yumi helpim ol manmeri bilong Jisas i bihainim Em.
